Packagist updated their download statistics, which make this project redundant. Check out Laravel's download statistics on packagist.org .

February 2023

Laravel v9.0 was the most popular version in February 2023. It has been downloaded 2'070'376 times. That's 49.5% of all downloads!

In total, Laravel has been downloaded 4'180'708 times this month.

How are these numbers calculated?
